problem:
例5. 设 $a, b, c>0$, 求证:
$$
\frac{c}{a}+\frac{a}{b+c}+\frac{b}{c} \geqslant 2 .
$$
solution:
证明:由平均值不等式, 得
$$
\begin{aligned}
\frac{c}{a}+\frac{a}{b+c}+\frac{b}{c} & =\frac{c}{a}+\frac{a}{b+c}+\frac{b+c}{c}-1 \\
& \geqslant 3 \sqrt[3]{\frac{c}{a} \cdot \frac{a}{b+c} \cdot \frac{b+c}{c}}-1 \\
& =3-1=2,
\end{aligned}
$$
即命题成立.
